description.alert:
Results of this test are just indicative and should not alarm you.

In case the test marks you as positive, itâ€™s merely a recommendation to further explore your case and contact your healthcare professionals.

In case the test marks you as negative but you are still doubtful you are encouraged to seek help from your healthcare professionals.
description.message:
The test below has been developed to help you identify if your symptoms match with the typical Corona Virus (Covid-19) and give you a guide to better understand how to take your precautions.

This guide is by no means replacement for your healthcare system or doctor, it has merely been developed to help you understand better your situation.

donate.text:
This website was published to increase people awareness about Covid-19 virus, you can use it at no cost and the author earns nothing from it.

Though **maintaining a website like this has costs.** 

If you think too that the pandemic crisis of these weeks needs to be contained in every possible way, please help us with a donation, so that we can keep on spreading the test and the awareness about Covid-19 dangerousness. 

Please, consider making a donation with the button below.

privacy.notice1: To guarantee the privacy of your health conditions, this website is completely anonymous, we don't use any kind of tracking devices to identify you and we don't save any of the test results.

share.text: If you too think that the pandemic of these weeks needs to be contained in any possible way, help us spread this test, **share this page to all your contacts.**

twitter.shareText: Covid-19 test,do the test to know your risk

test.text:
To ensure an accurate response you should answer the following questions to the best of your knowledge and understanding.

There are **no wrong answers**, the only wrong answer is the one you don't feel right with.
test.title: The test

precautions.text:
Every nation affected by the Covid-19 pandemic is responding autonomously to more or less everyone with the strategy of '**social distancing**', i.e. keeping citizens away from each other in order to contain and limit the contagion. 

This strategy has proved successful in China, and is proving its worth in other countries where it is used. 

In this article I will tell you some tricks to get through this period.

With 'social distancing' a nation generally imposes strong travel restrictions on its citizens, allowing them to leave home only for real needs: 

- medical examinations
- work (in some cases only for essential work)
- other needs (shopping, caring for the sick or other)
precautions.title: How to protect yourself, precautions

conditions.high: Warning, the test results indicates a high probability that you might be already infected. Don't worry, in the vast majority of cases there's no risk, and infected patients will heal within a few days as in any flu. It is paramount for you to stay at home and take all precautions to avoid infecting others. We strongly recommend you to contact your doctor and tell him/her your symptoms. You should also be mindful about how you feel, in case your conditions worsen, you should contact emergency (by phone, don't go out) and follow their instructions.
conditions.low: Compliments, your symptoms show little compatibility with Covid-19 symptoms. This is good news, but doesn't give 100% guarantee that you are disease free or can lower your guard. There are many infected people without symptoms. So if you doubt of this result we encourage you to contact your doctor for further checks.
conditions.mid: Warning, your results are uncertain, so we encourage you check with your doctor for further tests on your health. You should not worry now. We recommend you to stay at home and take all the precautions to avoid getting the infection or (in case you have it) infecting others.
conditions.name: Probability of getting sick

exposure.high: Warning, your results shows a high probability that you have already been infected, or might be infected soon. You should not worry though, in the vast majority of patients the infection is no different from a normal flu, and heals itself in a few days, while in few patients it will become something serious. Whether you are already infected or not, you immediately need to change your habits and rise your precautions, in order to protect yourself, and protect people around you from the infection.
exposure.low:
Compliments, your habits, lifestyle and neighbourhood exposes you to a low risk of infection, it is unlikely (but not impossible) that you have been already or will soon be infected. 

You should not lower your precautions though, the situation could change very quickly and without notice. In particular even though you might keep your guard high, your neighbours might become infected, exposing yourself to higher risks.
exposure.mid: Warning, your habits, lifestyle, and neighbourhood exposes you to a medium risk. Thus it is hard to say whether you have already been infected, but if you don't start immediately rising your precautions, it's possible that you might be infected soon. You should not worry now, in the vast majority of patients Covid-19 heals with no treatment, like a normal flu, while in just a minority it becomes something serious. So it is important that you protect yourself to stay safe and infection free. In case you are already infected you should still take extra precautions, so that you don't infect others.
exposure.name: Probability of being infected

gravity.high: Warning, your result shows a high probability that, should you be infected, you would suffer complications. If you think you are infected you should contact your doctors explaining your conditions and follow their instructions. If you are not infected you should take your precautions to the extreme, to avoid being infected.
gravity.low: Your physical and health conditions show that it is unlikely that when infected you develop serious symptoms from Covid-19. This is good news, but you should not lower your guard, there have been also some serious cases on otherwise healthy patients. It is therefore important to use all your precautions, also considering that you might become responsible of infecting others, who might be less fortunate than you are.
gravity.mid: Warning, your test shows that you have a medium risk of developing serious conditions from the infection. You are not completely risk free from serious conditions and complications from the disease. You need to keep up your precautions though, there have been a few serious cases on otherwise healthy people. Furthermore each and every infected is contagious, so don't risk infecting others.
gravity.name: If infected, probability of developing complications

category.no_data: Not enough info to give a result for the category "{{category}}"
